channel.title: Retrieving ordered entity list from rules API
channel.description: Is it possible to get an ordered list of rules (by due date or creation date) from the StackStorm rules API? (https://api.stackstorm.com/api/v1/rules/#/rule_controller.get_all) According to the API documentation there's no way of specifying the order of the list of rules returned, only the size.
